text: Feedback: new design manager … template preview … we need to be able to remove/disable the Preview toolbar … please

I second this - ideally something like codepen’s debug-view where there would be almost no HubSpot code on the page other than what would be used to render a HubSpot site(like any required css, jquery)

I do like the existing preview which lets you test that all of your fields and everything work and look right, so don’t get rid of it, it’d just be nice to have an alternate view to make it easier to troubleshoot issues.
